question: How many Indian players are placed in the top 100 most famous athletes list of ESPN?
explanation: ESPN has revealed the names of top 100 most famous athletes. 4 Indian cricketers are placed in the famous list. Indian skipper Virat Kohli has is at No.13, dropping five places from last year's No.8. He is closely followed by the Former Indian skipper Mahendra Singh Dhoni. He has dropped one place from last year's standings and is now placed at No.15. Yuvraj is placed at No.90 while Raina holds No.95.
